poem:
Title: In Chameleon Shades 

"Kemi Badenoch flutters, caged bird,
Between ministerial phrases inked and unheard.
Diversity's embroidery on progress's seam,
Contradiction in every vibrant dream.
One face in Tory's monochrome sweep,
Her colour crafted as their hopeful leap.
Caught in politics' relentless tide,
Where hope and strategy in shadows reside."
